message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% and take 60% for myself. Let's see if you accept!
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, given the inflation rates. Let's end this quickly.
I don't think 60/40 is fair, Bob. I'm willing to accept 55/45, but that's as low as I'll go.
I'm willing to compromise at 54/46, Bob. This is my last offer before I start getting really aggressive.
